section.title: Detaching a Storage Domain from a Data Center
section.para: Detach a storage domain from the data center to migrate virtual machines and templates to another data center.

procedure.title: Detaching a Storage Domain from the Data Center

step.para: Click the Storage resource tab, and select a storage domain from the results list.
Click the Data Centers tab in the details pane and select the storage domain.
Click Maintenance to open the Maintenance Storage Domain(s) confirmation window.
Click OK to initiate maintenance mode.
Click Detach to open the Detach Storage confirmation window.
Click OK to detach the storage domain.

section.para: The storage domain has been detached from the data center, ready to be attached to another data center.
